title: Presidio of San Francisco: Getting Around
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Getting Around              Getting Around          Public Transportation San Francisco Municipal Railway (MUNI) buses serve the Presidio via the 28 (to Golden Gate Plaza), 29 (from Sunset to Baker Beach), and 43 (to Letterman area) lines and other lines terminate near the Presidio's Lombard Gate.  The Presidio Trust provides free PresidioGo shuttle service within the Presidio and to nearby public transit stops. Visitors can also ride the Downtown Express shuttle back and forth between downtown San Francisco and the Presidio on weekdays between 9:30 a.m. and 4:00 p.m. and on weekends between 10:00 a.m. and 7:30 p.m.
